abstract: Political memoirs, debut novels, long-awaited follow-ups: Here’s what we’re looking forward to reading this year.
lead_paragraph: Here at the Book Review, we comb through thousands of books a year, while always keeping an eye on the horizon. (Is this the year that President Barack Obama’s memoir finally arrives?)
keywords: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes (Book)
Supreme Inequality: The Supreme Court's Fifty-Year Battle for a More Unjust America (Book)
Hidden Valley Road: Inside the Mind of an American Family (Book)
